Benchmark for 
#Angular1 #angular2 #React #VirtualDom #IncrementalDom #Citojs #Mithril #ember #ember2
TL;DR
1- Virtual Dom is the core advantage that react has over angular.
2- Virtual Dom has issues, so google developed incremental Dom library with similar apis to VD, still, no framework yet implemented it!
3- We see on the horizon Mithril, faster n lighter  -7.8KB- than react n angular2 with component tree base architecture, but, weaker community compared to react n angular.
4- react is UI library, just that, to use it u have to learn redux n jsx to be able to build frontend apps, unlike angular2, fewer concepts, less code to get the job done!
5- React n angular both have growing support for native mobile apps, react-Native n nativescript.

data.message: When I tried to learn React, the first tutorial almost damaged my brain. Life with Angular is very simple

1. Don't trust any benchmarks you didn't fake yourself

2. This post is dated January 2016. Angular 2 has almost been rewritten since then. It doesn't cover the AoT compiler at all for example, a key performance differentiator.

In short, my recommendation is: don't even bother spend time on this crap.
